text: Allan Rex Sandage was an American astronomer who worked at the Carnegie Observatories in Pasadena, California. He discovered asteroid (96155) 1973 HA on 27 April 1973. He also figured out the first fairly accurate measurements for the Hubble constant and the age of the universe. == References == Category:1926 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American astronomers Category:Scientists from Iowa Category:People from Iowa City, Iowa
title: Allan Sandage
